DOC.brief_summary: To assess the objective response rates (by RECIST) to ZD6474 100, 200 and 300 mg/day respectively
DOC.brief_title: ZD6474 Phase IIa Dose Finding Multicentre Study
DOC.criteria: Provision of written informed consent. Life expectancy of 12 weeks or longer. Pregnancy, breast feeding or female patients wishing to become pregnant. Treatment with a nonapproved or investigational drug within 30 days before enrolment
